markInChat.name: Mark in Chat
markInChat.description: If a player is on a list, chat messages from this player will get marked.

markOverHead.name: Mark in Nametag / Tab
markOverHead.description: If a player is on a list, their nametag will get marked.

scammerSubConfig.name: Scammer List by CommunityRadar
scammerSubConfig.description: If enabled, the scammer list from the CommunityRadar will get loaded.

trustedMMSubConfig.name: Trusted MM List by verbvllert_
trustedMMSubConfig.description: If enabled, the trusted MM list from verbvllert_ will get loaded.

openDiscord.name: Community Discord
openDiscord.description: Invite link to the official community Discord server.

openGitHub.name: Github repository
openGitHub.description: Link to the official Github repositorys.

command.missingargument: §cNot enough arguments. Check /radar help for syntax.

help.text:
§7Custom listen:
§c/radar listen §7--> §6Zeigt einem alle Listen an.
§c/radar list add §e<Name> <Prefix> §7--> §6Erstellt eine Liste.
§c/radar list prefix §e<Name> <Prefix> §7--> §6Ändert den Prefix einer Liste.
§c/radar list delete §e<Name> §7--> §6Löscht eine Liste.
§c/radar list show §e<Liste> §7--> §6Zeigt einem alle Spieler einer Liste.

§7Checken:
§c/radar check §e<Name> §7--> §6Checkt einen Spieler, ob er auf irgendeiner Liste ist.
§c/radar check * §7--> §6Checkt den ganzen CB und gibt die Spieler aus, auf welcher Liste diese sind.

§7Spieler und Listen:
§c/radar player add §e<Liste> <Name> <Notizen...> §7--> §6Fügt einen Spieler auf eine Liste hinzu.
§c/radar player remove §e<Name> §7--> §6entfernt einen Spieler von einer Liste.

add.failed: §cFailed to create list. Is the namespace unique?

delete.failed: §cFailed to delete list. Is the name correct? And is it a private list?

show.failed: §cFailed to show list. Is the name correct?

check.nopersoninlist: §cThere is no person online, that is on one of you lists.
check.failed: §cDidn´t found the given player on any list.

add.failed: §cCannot add player. Did you use a private list?
add.inlist: The player is already on a list.

remove.failed: §cCannot remove player. Did you use a private list?
remove.notinlist: The player is not on any list.
